Title: Bypass
Writer: Bianca Schmitz, Diane Vermooten, Shane Vermooten
Actors: Natalie Becker, Joel Brown, Arnold Chikunda, Melissa Haiden
Plot: When Dr Lisa Cooper, a renowned cardiac surgeon, is forced to make decisions regarding the life of her son SAM COOPER, she has no choice but to turn her back on the medical system she has devoted her life to.
